mapper.insert: insert into market_trade (saleMemberId , buyMemberId , tradeStatus , tradeTime , boardId) values (#{saleMemberId},#{buyMemberId},"거래중",now(),#{boardId})
mapper.update: update market_trade set tradeStatus = "거래완료" where boardId = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from market_trade where saleMemberId = #{id} or buyMemberId = #{id}
